attributes.action: Scrap GCSEs in England and Wales
attributes.additional_details: GCSEs are extremely useless outside the UK if a person wanted to go to a university abroad they will ask about their A-Levels not GCSEs. The only thing these exams do is stress to children for no reason and children with extremely strict parents can be in danger of physical abuse, being kicked out or in some cases being sent to their home country. All this is, is a useless exam which causes unneeded stress to minors.
attributes.background: Get rid of GCSEs in England and Wales if they get scrapped in Scotland. Prioritise ability over memory.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to replace GCSEs with.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do and what they could replace GCSEs with or you might like to sign a similar petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634392.
